title: We now have: 1) Observation Engine watching emails/trading/system, 2) Brain Loop for autonomous decisions, 3) DeepSeek API access (cheap AI!), 4) Gmail connected to Railway/GitHub/more. What should the swarm build or focus on next to reach self-sustainability (/mo)?
